mn16:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn16:2.1: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno panca cetokhila appahina, panca cetasovinibandha asamucchinna, so vatimasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn16:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati.
mn16:3.3: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:3.4: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pathamo cetokhilo appahino hoti.
mn16:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati …pe…
mn16:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sanghe kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati …pe…
mn16:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaya kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati.
mn16:6.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaya kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:6.3: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam catuttho cetokhilo appahino hoti.
mn16:7.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacarisu kupito hoti anattamano ahatacitto khilajato.
mn16:7.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacarisu kupito hoti anattamano ahatacitto khilajato, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:7.3: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pancamo cetokhilo appahino hoti.
mn16:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kame avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho.
mn16:8.3: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kame avitarago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaso avigataparilaho avigatatanho, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:8.4: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pathamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
mn16:9.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye avitarago hoti …pe…
mn16:10.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rupe avitarago hoti …pe…
mn16:11.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutto viharati.
mn16:11.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutto viharati, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:11.3: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam catuttho cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
mn16:12.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti.
mn16:12.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:12.3: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pancamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
mn16:13.1: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime panca cetokhila appahina, ime panca cetasovinibandha asamucchinna, so vatimasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissatiti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn16:14.1: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno panca cetokhila pahina, panca cetasovinibandha susamucchinna, so vatimasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn16:15.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari na kankhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasidati.
mn16:15.3: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari na kankhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasidati, tassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:15.4: Yassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pathamo cetokhilo pahino hoti.
mn16:16.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme na kankhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasidati …pe…
mn16:17.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sanghe na kankhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasidati …pe…
mn16:18.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhaya na kankhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasidati …pe…
mn16:19.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacarisu na kupito hoti na anattamano anahatacitto akhilajato.
mn16:19.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacarisu na kupito hoti na anattamano anahatacitto akhilajato, tassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:19.3: Yassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pancamo cetokhilo pahino hoti.
mn16:20.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kame vitarago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaso vigataparilaho vigatatanho.
mn16:20.3: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kame vitarago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaso vigataparilaho vigatatanho, tassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:20.4: Yassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pathamo cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
mn16:21.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye vitarago hoti …pe…
mn16:23.1: na yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutto viharati.
mn16:23.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutto viharati, tassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:23.3: Yassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam catuttho cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
mn16:24.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti.
mn16:24.2: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na annataram devanikayam panidhaya brahmacariyam carati: ‘iminaham silena va vatena va tapena va brahmacariyena va devo va bhavissami devannataro va’ti, tassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
mn16:24.3: Yassa cittam namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, evamassayam pancamo cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
mn16:25.1: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime panca cetokhila pahina, ime panca cetasovinibandha susamucchinna, so vatimasmim dhammavinaye vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjissatiti—thanametam vijjati.
mn16:27.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, evam ussolhipannarasangasamannagato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidaya, bhabbo sambodhaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
mn16:27.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kukkutiya andani attha va dasa va dvadasa va.
mn16:27.3: Tanassu kukkutiya samma adhisayitani samma pariseditani samma paribhavitani.
mn16:27.4: Kincapi tassa kukkutiya na evam iccha uppajjeyya:
mn16:27.5: ‘aho vatime kukkutapotaka padanakhasikhaya va mukhatundakena va andakosam padaletva sotthina abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti.
mn16:27.6: Atha kho bhabbava te kukkutapotaka padanakhasikhaya va mukhatundakena va andakosam padaletva sotthina abhinibbhijjitum.
mn16:27.7: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, evam ussolhipannarasangasamannagato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidaya, bhabbo sambodhaya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya”ti.
mn16:27.9: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
